name: ecommerce-order-system-solution
description: E-commerce order processing system refactored with design patterns (reference solution)

scripts.db:init: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('schema.sql', 'orders.db.sql'); console.log('Database initialized. Run: sqlite3 orders.db < schema.sql')"
scripts.db:reset: rm -f orders.db && sqlite3 orders.db < schema.sql && echo 'Database reset complete'

author: Liatrio DevOps Bootcamp
